parameters.name: Nsize
parameters.description: Number of entities to use to create a mate

parameters.name: MateEntArr
parameters.description: Array of entities to sue to create a mate (see Remarks )

parameters.name: MateTypeFromEnum
parameters.description: Type of mate as defined in swMateType_e

parameters.name: AlignFromEnum
parameters.description: Type of alignment as defined in swMateAlign_e

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: Distance to use with distance or limit mates

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Angle to use with angle mates

parameters.name: ErrorStatus
parameters.description: Success or error as defined by swAddMateError_e

title: IMoveCopyBodyFeatureData.IAddMate
description: Adds a mate to the feature.
signature:
Mate2 IAddMate( 
   System.Int32
Nsize
,
   ref System.Object
MateEntArr
,
   System.Int32
MateTypeFromEnum
,
   System.Int32
AlignFromEnum
,
   System.Double
Distance
,
   System.Double
Angle
,
   out System.Int32
ErrorStatus
)

parameters.name: Nsize
parameters.description: Number of entities to use to create a mate

parameters.name: MateEntArr
parameters.description: Array of entities to sue to create a mate (see Remarks )

parameters.name: MateTypeFromEnum
parameters.description: Type of mate as defined in swMateType_e

parameters.name: AlignFromEnum
parameters.description: Type of alignment as defined in swMateAlign_e

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: Distance to use with distance or limit mates

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Angle to use with angle mates

parameters.name: ErrorStatus
parameters.description: Success or error as defined by swAddMateError_e

remarks:
You can specify MateEntArr with either an array of mate entities or null. If you specify null, then before calling this method, you must call
IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2
with a selection mark of 1 to select each mate entity.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
